charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_0401_0400_: You look like you wanna ask what we’re doing.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_0700_: I was just gazing out at the ocean with Lycanroc.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_0800_:
I was thinking we could watch the sunset, then
head back once it got dark.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_0302_1100_:
I think spending time together like
that is important.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_1400_:
Before, I felt like I needed to rush. That feeling is
gone now.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_1500_: That’s why I’m taking a page out of Tina’s book...
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_1600_:
and spending more time like this with Lycanroc
instead of forcing ourselves to train.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_0401_1800_:
Yeah. His appearance may have changed, but he’s
still the same friendly pup as before.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_0402_2000_:
Haha, I bet he wants to spend some time with
you, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2100_:
Lycanroc...or rather, Rockruff...was the very first
Pokémon I got when I started out as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2200_:
That’s why I was always a little worried about not
being able to evolve him for so long...
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2300_:
Where I come from, Rockruff is a relatively rare
Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2400_:
Professor Bellis told me that maybe he wasn’t
compatible with that environment.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2600_:
I personally think there were other reasons why
Rockruff didn’t evolve.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2700_:
I think maybe he was waiting until I was ready
to handle his evolved form, Lycanroc...
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2800_:
In other words, he was waiting for me to grow
as a Trainer before evolving. That’s my theory.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_2900_:
Sometimes, inexperienced Trainers get
overwhelmed when their Pokémon become
really powerful after evolving.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3000_:
I bet Rockruff could tell I was worried and
rushing.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3100_:
So in a way, I think him not evolving was a
reflection of myself and all the parts of me that
hadn’t matured yet.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3200_:
Well...maybe that’s just wishful thinking on
my part.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3300_: Either way, Lycanroc is still by my side.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3400_:
In order to live up to the trust and hope he’s put
in me...
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_3500_: I’ll definitely beat you one day.
charaepi_ch0064_01_rival/2301_1201_4100_:
Right now, let’s just enjoy spending time with
our Pokémon.
